mapper.insert: insert into RTS_METADATA (PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, TOPIC,DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update RTS_METADATA SET NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOPIC = #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, TOPIC,DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_METADATA where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, TOPIC,DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0'

select md.PK_ID, md.DS_ID, md.NAME, md.DESCRIPTION, md.NOTE, md.TOPIC,md.DEL_FLG, md.CRT_USER, md.CRT_TIME, md.UPT_USER, md.UPT_TIME,ds.NAME AS DS_NAME,ds.TYPE AS DS_TYPE from RTS_METADATA md LEFT JOIN COM_DATASOURCE ds ON md.DS_ID=ds.PK_ID where md.DEL_FLG = '0' and md.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and md.DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{describe}||'%' and md.NOTE LIKE '%'||#{note}||'%' and md.TOPIC LIKE '%'||#{topic}||'%' and ds.NAME like '%'||#{dsName}||'%' and ds.TYPE = #{dsType} and md.CRT_TIME >= #{crtTimeStart} and #{crtTimeEnd} >= md.CRT_TIME and md.UPT_TIME >= #{uptTimeStart} and #{uptTimeEnd} >= md.UPT_TIME and md.CRT_USER like '%'||#{crtUser}||'%' and md.UPT_USER like '%'||#{uptUser}||'%' order by md.UPT_TIME desc, md.CRT_TIME desc, md.NAME asc
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, NOTE,TOPIC, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME from RTS_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_ID from RTS_CUSTOMER_CONFIG where MD_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLG = '0'
union all
select PK_ID from RTS_PRODUCRER_CONFIG where MD_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLG = '0'
